name: Dungeon Dash (HuntExe)
description:
You've just escaped your dungeon cell, and are left with nothing but a map. Find your way through the rest of the dungeon without getting too close to the goblins blocking your path.

Created for the Knitweave Game Jam:

-All Art, and Code Made by HuntExe

-Music by Komiku, and Rolemusic

-Additional Ideas and Testing by SnowyOcelot99

Controls:

WASD - Movement

F - Map

ESC - Settings

System Requirments:

-Microsoft 64bit Windows 10

- 1920x1080 Screen (preferred)
